TEXT.TITLE: A.T. BROD NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: A.T. Brod and Co Inc, an investment banking firm, said Michael L. Brod has been named president and chief operating officer, succeeding his father Albert T. Brod, who remains chairman and chief executive officer. Reuter
